Einhar Frey: Haha! You are captured, stupid beast.
Daresso: People of the gutters, steel your bellies, for the slaughter is at hand!
Helena: That thing... It slaughtered everyone. Help me!

Elreon, Loremaster: God bless you on this fine day, exile!
Catarina, Master of the Dead: Come to me, exile. Let us speak of death and desire.
Vagan, Weaponmaster: You there! Let me bend your ear for a moment.
Vorici, Master Assassin: You there. A moment of your time.
